channel.title: Sprite help please? [blurrs base] 317
channel.description:
Ok, I have a Problem with my sprites this is a [317] client based off of Blurrs Client. Ok, my problem is really 3 in 1.
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mxpc05.jpg[/img]
Lets start with Yellow when I click on my clan botton it lights up the ignore players button9As you can see I currently have the clan tab open). how do I make it highlight the clan button instead(If I click the ignore players button it highlights the ignore players button).
[s]Now to blue. If I click on it, it opend the tab but the crown goes away and it becomes a red button (As if it is highlighted). How do I get the crown to stay?[/s]
And as for red how do I utilize it? As in make it a... staff control panel.
Thanks, FusionLord
[edit] Fixed blue.

item.title: Sprite help please? [blurrs base] 317
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
